# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int=10)::String
    words = split(s)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        else
            if current_line == ""
                current_line = word
            else
                current_line *= " " * word
            end
        end
    end
    
    if current_line != ""
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end
    
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example usage:
s = "This is an example of a wrap_string function in Julia"
println(wrap_string(s, 10))
```
